subject: feat(import): add heading hierarchy to markdown import
body:
All headings (h1-h6) now become nodes instead of only h1. Heading
depth creates parent-child "contains" arcs (e.g., h2 under h1 gets a
"contains" arc from h1 to h2). Wiki-links still create "links to" arcs.

Added setext frontmatter artifact detection to filter fake h2 headings
that remark generates from post-heading YAML blocks. Updated tutorial
modal step 5 to mention markdown import. Created comprehensive format
documentation at docs/markdown-import-format.md.

Tags: markdown, import, hierarchy, parser, docs
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: markdown-import
Semver: minor
